This report confirms what many of us have long suspected: the British government and BP wanted Al-Megrahi released so that an oil deal being negotiated with Libya could go forward. Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand said the findings only heighten her worry that Megrahi's release undermines the international struggle against terrorism."
